EmailTemplate.name: EM-202304-EMP-WPCIE-DEMAND-GEN.Email #1 (One client’s story: Comprehensive care
EmailTemplate.subject: One client’s story: Comprehensive care with a single app
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A better experience—for both our members and clients The complexity of our members and their health are going to be addressed in a more comprehensive fashion given the broad spectrum of care Teladoc Health can provide." – Darcy Sementi, Healthcare Benefits Manager Healthcare benefits manager Darcy Sementi already knew the positive impact Teladoc Health’s virtual care services can have on her member population. Now she’s extending the range of services she can offer her employees—including virtual primary, mental health and chronic care. In this short video <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/video/client-testimonial-building-on-a-strong-foundation/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=CTA_In-this-short-video-watch-now&utm_term=&utm_campaign=EM-202304-EMP-WPCIE-Demand-Gen&utm_campaign_id=TD02/]]>, she shares how: • An integrated approach connects members with a wide range of services with just one app • More members are building primary care relationships and better self-managing their care between visits • Whole-person care addresses multiple health challenges in a more effective, more comprehensive way About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
